comment: What? You mean on the land Israel captured from Muhammadans when they tried sneak attacking with combined armies twice, and lost both times. That land is Israeli now. They very kindly let Islamics there govern themselves. I'd have kicked the lot out years ago for complicity.

      :snt1 (m2 / mean-01

            :ARG2 (l / land

                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Israel"))
                        :ARG2 (p / person

                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Muhammad")))
                        :time (a / and
                              :op1 (t / try-01
                                    :frequency 2
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 (s / sneak-01
                                          :ARG0 c2
                                          :ARG1 (a2 / attack-01
                                                :ARG0 c2
                                                :instrument (a3 / army
                                                      :ARG1-of (c3 / combine-01)))))
                              :op2 (l2 / lose-03
                                    :ARG0 c2
                                    :ARG1 c2
                                    :ARG2 a3))))
            :snt2 (p2 / person
                  :mod (c4 / country
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Israel"))
                  :domain c2
                  :time (n4 / now))
            :snt3 (l3 / let-01
                  :ARG0 (t2 / they)
                  :ARG1 (g / govern-01
                        :ARG0 (r2 / religious-group
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "Islam"))
                        :ARG1 t2)
                  :ARG1-of (k / kind-01
                        :degree (v / very)))
            :snt4 (k2 / kick-out-05
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (l4 / lot)
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (n6 / now)
                        :quant (m3 / multiple
                              :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (y2 / year))))
                  :ARG1-of (c5 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (c6 / complicity)))))
